== Ubuntu Kootenay Reporting Page ==

Welcome to the Ubuntu Kootenay reporting page. Every month this page is updated with summaries of our major accomplishments. (This is not meant to be a meeting summary.)

Reporting included here is due by the '''22nd''' of every month (for accomplishments from the previous calendar month.)

=== May 2009 ===

Major activities:
<<BR>>* Founded the Ubuntu Kootenay team.

=== Aug 2009 ===
 
<<BR>> *Installed Ubuntu file backup system using Ubuntu Jaunty in local business to replace their windows file system.
<<BR>>*made a wallpapper for the Ubuntu Jaunty 9.04 that is installed and distributed with all Ubuntu copy.
<<BR>>*made label for the Ubuntu Kootenay Group
<<BR>>*working on addition software pack for Ubuntu Jaunty 
<<BR>>* Working on wall papper for Ubuntu Koala
